verses.verse: Now the famine <S%H7458><s%> was severe <S%H3515><s%> in the land. <S%H776><s%>

So it came <S%H1961><s%> about when <S%H9201><s%> they had finished <S%H3615><s%> eating <S%H398><s%> the grain <S%H7668><s%> which <S%H834><s%> they had brought <S%H935><s%> from Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> that their father said <S%H1><s%> to them, "Go <S%H559><s%> back, <S%H7725><s%> buy <S%H7725><s%> us a little <S%H7666><s%> food. <S%H4592><s%>"

Judah <S%H3063><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> to him, however, saying, <S%H559><s%> "The man <S%H376><s%> solemnly <S%H5749><s%> warned <S%H5749><s%> us, 'You shall not see <S%H7200><s%> my face <S%H6440><s%> unless <S%H1115><s%> your brother <S%H251><s%> is with you.'
"If <S%H518><s%> you send <S%H7971><s%> our brother <S%H251><s%> with us, we will go <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> and buy <S%H7666><s%> you food. <S%H400><s%>

"But if <S%H518><s%> you do not send <S%H7971><s%> [him,] we will not go <S%H3381><s%> down; <S%H3381><s%> for the man <S%H376><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to us, 'You shall not see <S%H7200><s%> my face <S%H6440><s%> unless <S%H1115><s%> your brother <S%H251><s%> is with you.'"

Then Israel <S%H3478><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Why <S%H4100><s%> did you treat <S%H7489><s%> me so badly <S%H7489><s%> by telling <S%H5046><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> whether you still <S%H5750><s%> had [another] brother <S%H251><s%>?"

But they said, <S%H559><s%> "The man <S%H376><s%> questioned <S%H7592><s%> particularly <S%H7592><s%> about us and our relatives, <S%H4138><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> 'Is your father still <S%H1><s%> alive <S%H5750><s%>? Have <S%H2416><s%> you [another] brother <S%H3426><s%>?' So we answered <S%H251><s%> his questions. <S%H5046><s%> Could we possibly <S%H1697><s%> know <S%H3045><s%> that he would say, <S%H3045><s%> 'Bring <S%H559><s%> your brother <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H251><s%>'?"

And Judah <S%H3063><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to his father Israel, <S%H1><s%> "Send <S%H3478><s%> the lad <S%H7971><s%> with me, and we will arise <S%H5288><s%> and go, <S%H6965><s%> that we may live <S%H1980><s%> and not die, <S%H2421><s%> we as well <S%H4191><s%> as you and our little <S%H1571><s%> ones. <S%H2945><s%>

"I myself <S%H595><s%> will be surety <S%H6148><s%> for him; you may hold <S%H1245><s%> <S%H3027><s%> me responsible <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3027><s%> for him. If <S%H518><s%> I do not bring <S%H935><s%> him [back] to you and set <S%H3322><s%> him before <S%H6440><s%> you, then let me bear <S%H2398><s%> the blame <S%H2398><s%> before you forever. <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3117><s%>
"For if <S%H3884><s%> we had not delayed, <S%H4102><s%> surely <S%H3588><s%> by now <S%H6258><s%> we could have returned <S%H7725><s%> twice. <S%H6471><s%>"

Then their father Israel <S%H1><s%> said <S%H3478><s%> to them, "If <S%H559><s%> [it must be] so, <S%H518><s%> then <S%H3651><s%> do <S%H645><s%> this: <S%H6213><s%> take <S%H2088><s%> some <S%H3947><s%> of the best <S%H4480><s%> products <S%H2173><s%> of the land <S%H2173><s%> in your bags, <S%H776><s%> and carry <S%H3627><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to the man <S%H3381><s%> as a present, <S%H376><s%> a little <S%H4503><s%> balm <S%H4592><s%> and a little <S%H6875><s%> honey, <S%H4592><s%> aromatic <S%H1706><s%> gum <S%H5219><s%> and myrrh, <S%H5219><s%> pistachio <S%H3910><s%> nuts <S%H992><s%> and almonds. <S%H992><s%>

"And take <S%H3947><s%> double <S%H4932><s%> [the] money <S%H3701><s%> in your hand, <S%H3027><s%> and take <S%H7725><s%> back <S%H7725><s%> in your hand <S%H3027><s%> the money <S%H3701><s%> that was returned <S%H7725><s%> in the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of your sacks; <S%H572><s%> perhaps <S%H194><s%> it was a mistake. <S%H4870><s%>
"Take <S%H3947><s%> your brother <S%H251><s%> also, and arise, <S%H6965><s%> return <S%H7725><s%> to the man; <S%H376><s%>

and may God <S%H410><s%> Almighty <S%H7706><s%> grant <S%H5414><s%> you compassion <S%H7356><s%> in the sight <S%H6440><s%> of the man, <S%H376><s%> that he may release <S%H7971><s%> to you your other <S%H312><s%> brother <S%H251><s%> and Benjamin. <S%H1144><s%> And as for me, if <S%H834><s%> I am bereaved <S%H7921><s%> of my children, <S%H7921><s%> I am bereaved. <S%H7921><s%> "

So the men <S%H376><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> present, <S%H4503><s%> and they took <S%H3947><s%> double <S%H4932><s%> [the] money <S%H3701><s%> in their hand, <S%H3027><s%> and Benjamin; <S%H1144><s%> then they arose <S%H6965><s%> and went <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to Egypt <S%H4714><s%> and stood <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Joseph. <S%H3130><s%>

When Joseph <S%H3130><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> with them, he said <S%H559><s%> to his house <S%H1004><s%> steward, <S%H834><s%> <S%H5921><s%> "Bring <S%H935><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> into the house, <S%H1004><s%> and slay <S%H2873><s%> [an animal] and make <S%H3559><s%> ready; <S%H3559><s%> for the men <S%H376><s%> are to dine <S%H398><s%> with me at noon. <S%H6672><s%>"
So the man <S%H376><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> as Joseph <S%H3130><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> and brought <S%H935><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> to Joseph's house. <S%H1004><s%>

Now the men <S%H376><s%> were afraid, <S%H3372><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> they were brought <S%H935><s%> to Joseph's house; <S%H1004><s%> and they said, <S%H559><s%> "[It is] because <S%H5921><s%> <S%H1697><s%> of the money <S%H3701><s%> that was returned <S%H7725><s%> in our sacks <S%H572><s%> the first <S%H8462><s%> time <S%H8462><s%> that we are being brought <S%H935><s%> in, that he may seek <S%H1556><s%> occasion <S%H1556><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> us and fall <S%H5307><s%> upon us, and take <S%H3947><s%> us for slaves <S%H5650><s%> with our donkeys. <S%H2543><s%>"

So they came <S%H5066><s%> near <S%H5066><s%> to Joseph's house <S%H1004><s%> steward <S%H376><s%>, <S%H834><s%> <S%H5921><s%> and spoke <S%H1696><s%> to him at the entrance <S%H6607><s%> of the house, <S%H1004><s%>

and said, <S%H559><s%> "Oh, <S%H994><s%> my lord, <S%H113><s%> we indeed <S%H3381><s%> came <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> the first <S%H8462><s%> time <S%H8462><s%> to buy <S%H7666><s%> food, <S%H400><s%>

and it came <S%H1961><s%> about when <S%H3588><s%> we came <S%H935><s%> to the lodging <S%H4411><s%> place, <S%H4411><s%> that we opened <S%H6605><s%> our sacks, <S%H572><s%> and behold, <S%H2009><s%> each <S%H376><s%> man's money <S%H3701><s%> was in the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of his sack, <S%H572><s%> our money <S%H3701><s%> in full. <S%H4948><s%> So we have brought <S%H7725><s%> it back <S%H7725><s%> in our hand. <S%H3027><s%>

"We have also brought <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> other <S%H312><s%> money <S%H3701><s%> in our hand <S%H3027><s%> to buy <S%H7666><s%> food; <S%H400><s%> we do not know <S%H3045><s%> who <S%H4310><s%> put <S%H7760><s%> our money <S%H3701><s%> in our sacks. <S%H572><s%>"

And he said, <S%H559><s%> "Be at ease, <S%H7965><s%> do not be afraid. <S%H3372><s%> Your God <S%H430><s%> and the God <S%H430><s%> of your father has given <S%H1><s%> you treasure <S%H5414><s%> in your sacks; <S%H4301><s%> I had <S%H572><s%> your money. <S%H935><s%>" Then he brought <S%H3701><s%> Simeon <S%H3318><s%> out to them.

Then the man <S%H376><s%> brought <S%H935><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> into Joseph's house <S%H1004><s%> and gave <S%H5414><s%> them water, <S%H4325><s%> and they washed <S%H7364><s%> their feet; <S%H7272><s%> and he gave <S%H5414><s%> their donkeys <S%H2543><s%> fodder. <S%H4554><s%>

So they prepared <S%H3559><s%> the present <S%H4503><s%> for Joseph's coming <S%H935><s%> at noon; <S%H6672><s%> for they had heard <S%H8085><s%> that they were to eat <S%H398><s%> a meal <S%H3899><s%> there. <S%H8033><s%>

When Joseph <S%H3130><s%> came <S%H935><s%> home, <S%H1004><s%> they brought <S%H935><s%> into the house <S%H1004><s%> to him the present <S%H4503><s%> which <S%H834><s%> was in their hand <S%H3027><s%> and bowed <S%H7812><s%> to the ground <S%H776><s%> before him.

Then he asked <S%H7592><s%> them about their welfare, <S%H7965><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "Is your old <S%H2205><s%> father well, <S%H1><s%> of whom <S%H7965><s%> you spoke <S%H834><s%>? Is he still <S%H559><s%> alive <S%H5750><s%>?"

And they said, <S%H559><s%> "Your servant <S%H5650><s%> our father is well; <S%H1><s%> he is still <S%H7965><s%> alive. <S%H5750><s%>" And they bowed <S%H2416><s%> down <S%H6915><s%> in homage. <S%H7812><s%>

As he lifted <S%H5375><s%> his eyes <S%H5869><s%> and saw <S%H7200><s%> his brother <S%H251><s%> Benjamin, <S%H1144><s%> his mother's son, <S%H1121><s%> he said, <S%H559><s%> "Is this <S%H2088><s%> your youngest <S%H9512><s%> brother, <S%H251><s%> of whom <S%H834><s%> you spoke <S%H559><s%> to me?" And he said, <S%H559><s%> "May God <S%H430><s%> be gracious <S%H2603><s%> to you, my son. <S%H1121><s%>"

And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> hurried <S%H4116><s%> [out] for he was deeply <S%H7356><s%> stirred <S%H3648><s%> over <S%H413><s%> his brother, <S%H251><s%> and he sought <S%H1245><s%> [a place] to weep; <S%H1058><s%> and he entered <S%H935><s%> his chamber <S%H2315><s%> and wept <S%H1058><s%> there. <S%H8033><s%>
Then he washed <S%H7364><s%> his face, <S%H6440><s%> and came <S%H3318><s%> out; and he controlled <S%H662><s%> himself and said, <S%H559><s%> "Serve <S%H7760><s%> the meal. <S%H3899><s%>"

So they served <S%H7760><s%> him by himself, <S%H905><s%> and them by themselves, <S%H905><s%> and the Egyptians, <S%H4713><s%> who ate <S%H398><s%> with him, by themselves; <S%H905><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> the Egyptians <S%H4713><s%> could <S%H3201><s%> not eat <S%H398><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> with the Hebrews, <S%H5680><s%> for that is loathsome <S%H8441><s%> to the Egyptians. <S%H4714><s%>

Now they were seated <S%H3427><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him, the first-born according to his birthright <S%H1062><s%> and the youngest <S%H6810><s%> according to his youth, <S%H6812><s%> and the men <S%H376><s%> looked <S%H8539><s%> at one <S%H376><s%> another <S%H7453><s%> in astonishment. <S%H8539><s%>

And he took <S%H5375><s%> portions <S%H4864><s%> to them from his own table; <S%H6440><s%> but Benjamin's portion <S%H4864><s%> was five <S%H2568><s%> times <S%H3027><s%> as much <S%H7235><s%> as any <S%H3605><s%> of theirs. So they feasted <S%H8354><s%> and drank <S%H7937><s%> freely <S%H7937><s%> with him.
